channel.title: SkyLearn RSS Test B – Property + Entertainment Mixed Feed
channel.description: Feed containing three property-related and three entertainment stories for pre-filter validation

item.title: Landsec opens new flexible workspace hub in Victoria
item.description: Landsec has launched a 120,000 sq ft flexible office at Nova Place, designed for hybrid tenants seeking shorter lease terms.

item.title: Derwent London completes Fitzrovia redevelopment and signs anchor tenant
item.description: The developer has completed the £240 million refurbishment of 80 Charlotte Street, securing a pre-let with a design consultancy.

item.title: Legal & General relocates investment division to new Cardiff Bay HQ
item.description: The insurer will move 700 staff into a 95,000 sq ft waterfront building as part of its regional growth plan.

item.title: Netflix unveils teaser trailer for sci-fi epic “Starlight Frontier”
item.description: The new ten-part series, filmed in Scotland, stars John Boyega and premieres globally in March 2026.

item.title: Adele wins two Grammy Awards for album ‘Homecoming Nights’
item.description: The singer collected Record of the Year and Best Pop Album at a ceremony in Los Angeles.

item.title: Tom Hiddleston to play Sherlock Holmes in BBC Christmas special
item.description: The broadcaster confirmed filming begins this winter at Pinewood Studios for a 2026 release.
